game.name: DCS: AJS-37 Viggen by Heatblur Simulations
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: The AJS-37 Viggen is a Swedish double-delta supersonic attack aircraft from the late Cold War. It was the backbone of the Swedish Air Force during the Cold war, serving as the main attack and anti-ship platform. The AJS is the 90’s upgrade of this 70's era aircraft, adding several advanced weapons a
